channel.title: school on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in school on Barefoot Rob

item.title: School
item.description: (transcribed 11:25am CST Wednesday 22 January 2003) 4:20 P.M. I started a scrap book just now. Oh, wait, my day: I had 2 bowls of rice krispies and part of an apple for breakfast. For lunch I had a hamburger, a slice of pizza, and tea. For my snack I had the rest of my apple and some Graham crackers, milk, and some pepsi, and 3 slices of bread. School: English - we went to the library again.
